definition: surviving section of a classic work/remaining chapters (while reading a book)
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: Only a fragment of the ancient book remains now.
sentences.chinese: 那古书现在只剩下一点残卷了。

sentences.english: Then , I will study the art value of the remnant paper.
sentences.chinese: 第三，重点考察《珠英集》残卷的文学价值。

definition: volumes of classics/volumes of scriptures/ancient scrolls
imperial edict/heavenly book (superstition)/obscure or illegible writing/double dutch
manuscript copy of a book (before the printing press)
